SEARCH
Package management.actions

Class AdminStaffActions

java.lang.Object
management.actions.AdminStaffActions
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAdminStaffActions
public class AdminStaffActions extends Object implements IAdminStaffActions
The AdminStaffActions class provides methods for Admins to perform administrative actions related to staff members, such as adding, updating, removing, filtering, promoting, and transferring staff members.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminStaffActions

      public AdminStaffActions()

  • Method Details

    • addStaff

      public void addStaff()
      Adds a new staff member to the system. Prompts the user to input details of the new staff member. Validates the inputted details and adds the new staff member to the staffDirectory.
      Specified by:
      addStaff in interface IAdminStaffActions

    • updateStaff

      public void updateStaff()
      Updates an existing staff member in the system. Allows the user to choose which attribute of the staff member to update, out of name/staff/age. Validates the inputted details and updates the staff member in the staffDirectory.
      Specified by:
      updateStaff in interface IAdminStaffActions

    • removeStaff

      public void removeStaff()
      Removes an existing staff member from the staffDirectory. Allows the user to select which staff member has to be removed, and removes the selected staff member from the staffDirectory.
      Specified by:
      removeStaff in interface IAdminStaffActions

    • filterStaff

      public void filterStaff(StaffFilterOptions option)
      Filters staff members based on the specified filtering option. Available options to filter by are branch, role, gender and age.
      Specified by:
      filterStaff in interface IAdminStaffActions
      Parameters:
      option - The filtering option to apply.

    • assignManager

      public boolean assignManager(Branch branch)
      Checks if the managerQuota for the given branch has been exceeded.
      Parameters:
      branch - The Branch to check the managerQuota for.
      Returns:
      true if the managerQuota has not been exceeded, false otherwise.

    • promoteStaff

      public void promoteStaff()
      Promotes a Staff member to a Manager. Verifies if the staff being promoted is a Staff member, and promotes them to Manager if so.
      Specified by:
      promoteStaff in interface IAdminStaffActions

    • transferStaff

      public void transferStaff()
      Transfers a staff member to a different branch. Allows the user to select the staff member and the destination branch. Validates the transfer and updates the staff member's branch in the staffDirectory.
      Specified by:
      transferStaff in interface IAdminStaffActions
